comment: Proof of ~ ax-7 from ~ ax7v1 and ~ ax7v2 (and earlier axioms), proving sufficiency of the conjunction of the latter two weakened versions of ~ ax7v , which is itself a weakened version of ~ ax-7 . Note that the weakened version of ~ ax-7 obtained by adding a disjoint variable condition on ` x , z ` (resp. on ` y , z ` ) does not permit, together with the other axioms, to prove reflexivity (resp. symmetry). (Contributed by BJ, 7-Dec-2020.)
